correctness.description: The degree to which the final answer is accurate and correct.

completeness.description: How fully the answer addresses all aspects of the question.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow and understand the logical steps the system took to arrive at the answer.

reliability.description: The consistency of the system in providing correct answers to different questions over time.

efficiency.description: The system's effectiveness in reaching the solution using the least amount of time and resources.

adaptability.description: The system's ability to handle a variety of questions and adapt to the complexity and diversity of tasks.

verifiability.description: The degree to which external sources can confirm the information provided by the system.

historical_context_understanding.description: The system's capability to understand and apply historical context to the question where necessary.

source_reliability_assessment.description: How well the system evaluates and determines the reliability of its information sources.

response_clarity.description: The clarity and conciseness of the final answer provided by the system.
